alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 29 at 12:45PM EST until January 30 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 to 25 degrees below zero. * WHERE...Northern St. Lawrence, Northern Franklin, Eastern Clinton and Southwestern St. Lawrence Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest wind chill values will occur between 1 AM and 8 AM Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
